comments:
commonFilter.description attribute in org.eclipse.ui.navigator.navigatorContent extension point is not marked as required in the schema, but if I leave it empty it will NullPointerException:

The NPE is a defect; and I believe that a default value should be implemented. 

But for now, the work around is to set the description.

Implemented a default value.

Fixed and released to HEAD. Available in I-Build after > 20061203.
*** Bug 162704 has been marked as a duplicate of this bug. ***
